(Allaha) kahese basa! Mari same jhaghadavani vata na karo, hum to pahelathi ja tamari tarapha cetavani (yatananum vacana) mokali cukayo hato
mari pase vata badalati nathi ane na to hum mara banda'o para thodoka pana atyacara karavavalo chum
pachi hame jahannama thi puchisum sum tum bhara'i ga'i? Te javaba apase, sum haju vadhare che
ane jannata sanyamarakhanara mate najika karavamam avase, thodika pana dura nahi hoya
a te che jenum vacana tamane apavamam avatu hatum, dareka te vyakti mate je pacho pharanara ane niyantrana rakhanara hase
je rahamanathi vanadekhe darato hoya ane tauba karanaru hrdaya lavyo hase
tame a jannatamam salamati sathe pravesa pamo, a hammesa mate no divasa che
a (loko) tyam icchase, te'onum ja che, (parantu) amari pase ghanum badhum che
ane a pahela pana ame ghana samudayone nasta kari cukaya che, je a lokothi him'matamam ghani vadhare hati
amam hrdayavala mate sikhamana che, ane tena mate je dhyanadharine sambhale ane te hajara hoya
ni:Sanka ame akasa ane dharati ane je kami te'oni vacce che saunum cha divasamam sarjana kari didhum ane ame thakaya pana nahi
basa! A je kami pana kahe che tame tena para dhiraja rakho ane potana palanaharana namanum smarana prasansa sathe karo, suryodaya ane suryasta pahela pana
ane ratana ko'i pana samaye smarana karo ane namajha pachi pana
ane sambhalo ke je divasa eka pokaravavalo najikani jagya'ethi pokarase
je divase te sakhata cisane nisrcitapane sambhali lese, a divasa nikalavano hase
ame ja jivita kari'e chi'e ane ame ja mrtyu pana api'e chi'e. Ane amari ja pase pacha pharine avavanum che
Je divase dharati phati padase ane a dodata (nikali padase), a bhega kari devum amara mate khuba ja sarala che
a loko je kami kahi rahya che ame khuba ja sari rite jani'e chi'e ane tame te'ona para samartha nathi, to tame kura'ana vade te'one samajavata raho, je mari yatana (cetavaninum vacana) thi dare che
soganda che udavine vikhera'i nakhanarana (arthata te hava'ona soganda je matine udavine vikheri nakhe che)
pachi bhara uthavanarana
pachi naramithi calanarana (panimam calanari hodi'o)
pachi karyane vahenci nakhanara (arthata te pharista'o je'o karyani vahencani kari lem che)
ni:Sanka tamane je vacano karavamam ave che, (badha) sacca che
ane ni:Sanka n'yaya thase
soganda che vividha rupovala akasana
ni:Sanka tame vividha vato karo cho
anathi te vancita rakhavamam ave che je phari gayo hoya
nasta thaya atakalo karanara
je'o bedarakara che ane bhanavihona che
puche che ke badalano divasa kayare avase
ham, a te divasa che ke a loko agamam ulata-pulata padaya hase
potana upadravano svada cakho, a ja che, jeni tame utavala karata hata
ni:Sanka daranara'o jannato ane jharana'omam hase
temana palanahare je kami temane apyu che tene la'i rahya hase, te to a pahela pana sadacari hata
te'o ratre khuba ja ochum suta hata
ane sahari na samaye maphi mangata hata
ane temana dhanamam mangavavala'o mate ane mangavathi bacanara'o mate bhaga hato
ane visrvasa karanara'o mate to dharati para ghani ja nisani'o che
ane svayam tamara astitavamam pana, sum tame jota nathi
tamari roji ane je vacana tamane karavamam ave che, badhu ja akasamam che
Akasa ane dharatina palanaharana soganda, ke a kharekhara saccum che, evum ja jevi ke tame vato karo cho
sum tamane ibrahimana pratisthita mahemanoni khabara pahonci che
te'o jyare temani pase avya to temane salama karyum, ibrahime salamano javaba apyo (ane kahyum a to) ajanya loko che

ane tene temani same mukayum. Ane kahyum tame khata nathi
